recipe.title: Vegetable Lentil Curry
recipe.ingredient: 4-6 cups of water (add 6 cups if you like it more runny or less if you prefer it more solid- I add one stock cube per cup)
recipe.step: Heat oil in a large pot and cook garlic for 2 minutes then add curry paste and cook for a further 2-3 mins.
Add all other ingredients except spinach and cook until veggies are soft, about 20-40 mins.
Add spinach and stir until completely mixed through.
Serve with rice, yogurt and coriander sprinkled on top- Top Notch!.
